```{r echo = FALSE}
names = c(
  "Gabriela Massoni",
  "João Poloniato",
  "Carolina Thompson",
  "Tatyana Zabanova",
  "Márcia Silva",
  "Michelle Massaro"
)
years = c("2018-",
          "2017-",
          "2017-",
          "2016-",
          "2016-2017",
          "2016-2017"
)

UU = "Undergraduate"
MM = "Master"
levels = c(UU,
           MM,
           UU,
           MM,
           UU,
           UU
)
students_table = tibble::tibble(name=names,
                                level=levels,
                                year=years)
knitr::kable(students_table)
```
